sentences: Kirjelda ta välimust! Teda oli mulle kirjeldatud lüheldase kuivetu mehena.
Keegi ei osanud looma täpsemalt kirjeldada.
context: The word 'kirjeldama' in Estonian means 'to describe'. It is used when providing an account or depiction of someone or something, either orally or in writing. This verb appears in its partitive form 'pilti' in certain constructions where it functions as the object of another verb (in this case 'andma' - to give). The word can be used for detailed descriptions of people's appearances, events, scenes, or abstract concepts.
